name: TruongSinh Tran-Nguyen
bio: I am enthusiastic in technology and leadership, and has been woking in ICT industry for several years, both at technology- and business-oriented, with and without decision-making positions. I believe in creativity and revolution. With those enthusiasm, experiences and attitude, I take the challenging responsibility at Smarp as Head of Technology, be responsible for the actions and results delivered by the entire development team including but not limited to product development, deployment, and stability. I joined Smarp because the company proved to be agile yet well-defined, young yet wide-connected, and to have a talented and diversified Board of Directors.
